titles.title: There is great hope in His Name

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is great hope in His Name;
There is power to heal the sick and the lame.
He will mend the broken reed,
Nurse the dying wick to a flame

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines:
There is great hope in his name
There is power to heal the sick and the lame
We have victory over sin
Because Jesus lives within

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
There is great hope in his name
We will never be the same
For the love that conquers fear
Brings a lot of heaven here
